rules_text:
Bottom of the Deepmists enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.
{3}, {T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. This mana can't be spent to pay generic mana costs.
flavor_text: [i]In a coffin of blinding fog and perfect silence, the embalmed corpse of a beloved world rests.[/i]
